lead_paragraph: Andrew Svoboda, a 27-year-old professional playing out of Winged Foot, posted a three-under-par 68 to take the early lead at the 30th New York State Open at the Bethpage Black Course. Svoboda holds a one-shot lead over Chris Damiano of Westchester Hills Golf Club. They were the only players under par on the 7,241-yard course.
